survey_name: Smart Office Lighting System Preferences Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather insights on employee preferences for smart lighting systems in office environments to enhance productivity and energy efficiency.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current office lighting?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard Likert scale for satisfaction measurement. Ensure mobile-friendly radio button selection.
